resources.string: Please do not use this application whilst driving.\nOnly use this application whilst vehicle is parked
-US vehicles manufactured after 1996. \n-EU vehicles manufactured after 2004. \n-JAP vehicles manufactured after 2005

-Plug adapter into OBD-II 16-pin port. 
-Ensure green light flashes on adapter. 
-Start car engine. 
-Navigate to settings on Android device: Settings > Bluetooth > Adapter Name > Pair devices. 
-Naviagte to settings within app: Settings > Select adapter name from list.
